properties.name: Woodhenge Circle
properties.description: The Woodhenge was a series of large timber circles likely used for astronomical observations.

properties.name: Monks Mound Terrace 3 & 4
properties.description: These terraces are part of the massive Monks Mound, the largest prehistoric earthwork in North America.
